item.description:
Who wants to be in a relationship with oneself and the universe in a way that healing becomes natural, effortless and even fun
without trying to fix, change, or turn you into someone you’re not?

Let us get together for an evening of learning and healing and sharing before I take off to present at two conferences in June.  

Meet each other as you join us in exploration of what is new and highly successful in the evolution of healing practices.

Those who have experienced trauma and and have been affected by it in a lasting way, are often scared of what is going on with them and are afraid that they have been changed permanently. That is definitely not so.

At this event you will be learning:

  • the new ways to transform with ease even the most pronounced traumas in a way that you never imagined possible,
  • how anxiety and depression are manifestation of energy loss and displacement,
  • ways to re-build your soul’s home – the energetic membrane around your energy field.

Every meetup we witness first hand demonstration of just how dramatically effective energetic re-integration techniques can be in cases of profound emotional distress, various levels depression and anxiety. 

Regardless whether you are healing yourself, or helping others, no matter what the source or the intensity of your distress, these same methods will work just as successfully for you.These techniques can be used by anyone who want to experience a palpable change in how they are feeling right now.


Unfortunately millions of people have no choice but to try to live in the debilitating state of discomfort. You certainly do not need to be one of them.

I am inviting you to embark on an exciting journey to the new anxiety and trauma-free you. Let us get started. Join us for a highly experiential presentation, live demonstration and personal practices. 

Schedule
7:15  Meet and Greet
7:30 - 8:15 presentation, group practice and live demonstration,
8:15 - 9:15 Personal practice and sharing
9:15 - 8:30 Q&A
item.how_to_find_us: Up the stairs next to the yellow "Children" road sign, to the porch, through the front door, then inside the door to the left.

group.name: Freedom from Fear/ Anxiety /Emotional Trauma Group

item.name: The Art and Science of Healing - What you Never Imagined is Now Possible!
